sentence.Network_en: The players have comparatively long periods of inactivity.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些运动员闲着的时间相对较长。

sentence.Network_en: Inactivity can make your joints stiff, and the bones may begin to degenerate.
sentence.Network_cn: 长期不活动会导致关节僵硬，骨骼也可能开始退化。

sentence.Network_en: Silence, or visual inactivity, is a good way to indicate this termination.
sentence.Network_cn: 没有声音或视觉上没有变化, 是表示这种结果的好方式.

entry.tran: 无所作为的;不活动的;闲置的
entry.def: Someone or something that is inactive is not doing anything or is not working.

example.ex: He certainly was not politically inactive...
example.tran: 他政治上当然不是无所作为。

example.ex: The satellite had been inactive since its launch two years ago.
example.tran: 该卫星自从两年前发射以来一直没起作用。

means.word_mean: 2. a disposition to remain inactive or inert;

sentences.sentence: "he had to overcome his inertia and get back to work"

auth_sentence.content: Physical inactivity is the fourth leading cause of death worldwide.
auth_sentence.res_content: Physical inactivity is the fourth leading cause of death worldwide.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Physical inactivity is the fourth leading cause of death worldwide.

auth_sentence.content: In those circumstances, David Forde was probably not anticipating inactivity.
